Crazy.text: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
Crazy.author: Steve Jobs

The Art of War.text: If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles.
The Art of War.author: Sun Tzu

Ideas.text: Ideas are just a multiplier of execution.
Ideas.author: Derek Sivers

Weapons.text: A weapon is only as good its wielder.
Weapons.author: Unknown

Different.text: Every person has different qualities. Do not try to change them, learn to respect them.
Different.author: Me

The Last Samurai.text: There is so much here I will never understand. I've never been a church going man, and what I've seen on the field of battle has led me to question God's purpose. But there is indeed something spiritual in this place. And though it may forever be obscure to me, I cannot but be aware of its power.
The Last Samurai.author: Nathan Algren
